## Simulations

```{r}

# generate simulated data
simlist = simulate_data(n = 100, sigma2 = 0.003, argvals = 1:100/100)

# define PVE threshold and hormone set 
pve_thresh = 0.9
hnames_set = c("hormone1", "hormone2", "hormone3")

# run simulation
sim_res = run_simulation(hnames = hnames_set, simlist = simlist, pve = pve_thresh, numiter = 10)

sim_res %>% pull(daysoff) %>% quantile(c(0.25, 0.5, 0.75))


```
